bibl.title: Litura: éleifãw, not êleifar, and Other Words for 'Erasure'. <aleiphas, aleiphar>
bibl.note: When a papyrus has aleifatow, it should be accentuated éleifãtow with a note: read éleifãdow. ÖAleifar simply never occurs in papyri. Observations on the methods of correction and their designation in Greek. <aleiphatos, aleiphar>
BÜLOW-JACOBSEN Adam, Hélène CUVIGNY and Klaas A. WORP, Litura: éleifãw, not êleifar, and Other Words for 'Erasure'. <aleiphas, aleiphar>
